name: nms-project
description: Network Management System - Single Command Startup

scripts.install-all: cd mern-nms && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start-db: cd mern-nms && docker run -d --name nms-mongodb-standalone -p 27017:27017 -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=password123 -e MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=nms_db -v "$(pwd)/mongo-init.js:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/mongo-init.js:ro" mongo:7-jammy
scripts.stop-db: docker stop nms-mongodb-standalone && docker rm nms-mongodb-standalone

author: NMS Team
